s.detail:
Poison Gas Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;

z.detail:

    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 10 save or become restrained

details.history: The dungeon was created by a cult of elemental earth as a temple. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has fallen to ruin and been rebuilt many times since then.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)

settings.name: The Sanctum of the Lich Princess

wandering_monsters.1: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.2: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, returning to their lair with plunder
wandering_monsters.3: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316); deadly, 450 xp, lost and desperate
wandering_monsters.4: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 1 x Worg (cr 1/2, mm 341); hard, 200 xp, consumed by disease and madness
wandering_monsters.5: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.6: Goblin Boss (cr 1, mm 166) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, investigating a strange noise
